features.name: Authentication & Authorization
features.description: User authentication, email verification, password reset, role-based access control (Admin, Accountant, Staff, User)

features.name: Transaction Management
features.description: Create, read, update, delete transactions with categories, amounts, dates, and proof attachments. Includes approval workflow for deletions.

features.name: Invoice Management
features.description: Create, edit, delete invoices with items, client information, payment tracking, PDF generation, and public sharing links

features.name: Invoice Settlement
features.description: Public settlement links for invoice payment confirmation, token management, and payment proof upload

features.name: Debt Management
features.description: Manage debts (down payment and pass-through types), record payments, track payment status, and calculate remaining amounts

features.name: Category Management
features.description: Manage transaction categories (pemasukan/pengeluaran), create, update, delete categories with validation

features.name: Financial Reporting
features.description: Generate financial reports with filtering by date, category, type, user. Export to Excel format

features.name: Pass Through Invoice
features.description: Create pass-through invoices for advertising packages, manage packages, and track ad budget usage

features.name: Invoice Portal Passphrase
features.description: Manage passphrases for public invoice portal access, rotation, activation/deactivation, and usage logging

features.name: Public Invoice Submission
features.description: Allow public users to submit invoices and payment confirmations through portal with passphrase verification

features.name: User Management
features.description: Manage users, update roles, view profiles, handle account deletion requests with approval workflow

features.name: Activity Logging
features.description: Log user activities, admin activity log viewing, and activity tracking middleware

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Display financial summary, transaction overview, and key metrics for users

features.name: Settings Management
features.description: Manage application settings, display preferences, and data management (purge data)

features.name: Customer Service Management
features.description: Manage customer service records for invoice assignment

features.name: Access Code
features.description: Access code verification for certain features

features.name: Invoice Reminder
features.description: Send reminders for due invoices via console command

features.name: PDF Cache Management
features.description: Cleanup PDF cache files via console command
